#summary Configuration

To get goesmtp up and running you need to configure MySQL and create a config.cfg file in the goesmtp working directory.

= MySQL =


Add your content here.


= config.cfg =

{{{
# goESMTP server configuration file
[cluster]
type=master
id=1
master=192.168.1.2
ip=192.168.1.2

[smtp]
domains=example.com

[db]
type=MySQL
username=username
password=password
host=192.168.1.2
database=goesmtp
# End
}}}
